changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder, if there is no information on the update, it is because it concerns only the update of documentation, translation or text

index.md.Le plugin permet de connecter Jeedom à u: The plugin allows you to connect Jeedom to an existing MQTT brocker or to install one (in docker using the Docker plugin
index.md.servir de socle à d'autre plugin pour to: serve as a base for another plugin for all that goes through MQTT
index.md.vous pouvez créer des commandes (info\/a: you can create commands (info / action) to send / receive messages on MQTT
index.md.servir pour piloter jeedom depuis un aut: be used to drive jeedom from another MQTT equipment (such as Nodered for example
index.md.le plugin peut aussi bien piloter des co: the plugin can control Jeedom commands as well as broadcast all Jeedom events on MQTT
index.md.Jeedom va installer Mosquitto à l'aide d: Jeedom will install Mosquitto using the docker plugin (in a container therefore), it takes care of the configuration (in particular the authentication
index.md.Attention l'installation peut prendre pl: Please note the installation can take several tens of minutes
index.md.vous avez juste a indiquer a Jeedom l'ad: you just have to indicate to Jeedom the address of the brocker MQTT (ex
index.md.Vous pouvez spécifier des utilisateurs\/: You can specify users / password for connection
index.md.en mode local vous pouvez mettre un nom: in local mode you can put a username
index.md.mot de passe par ligne, chaque couple d': password per line, each identifier pair will have valid access to the brocker
index.md.Par defaut si il n'y a aucun identifiant: By default if there is no identifier jeedom automatically adds an identifier
index.md.en mode standalone il suffit de mettre s: in standalone mode, just put on the first line the username / password pair for jeedom, separated by
index.md.ex si le nom d'utilisateur est `jeedom`e: ex if the username is `jeedom` and the password` mqtt` you have to put `jeedom
index.md.En mode local il n'est pas possible de n: In local mode it is not possible not to have authentication
index.md.topic racine pour envoyer une commande à: root topic to send an order to Jeedom or to which it sends events
index.md.indique si Jeedom doit envoyer sur le bu: indicates whether Jeedom should send all the command events on the MQTT bus
index.md.Il est possible de creer des équipements: It is possible to create MQTT equipment directly from the plugin, be careful in this case no automation or template provided you have to do everything by hand
index.md.Il faut indiqué le topic racine (ex `tes: It is necessary to indicate the root topic (ex `test`) for the equipment then in the commands it is enough to
index.md.d'indiqué le topic complet, ex si vous m: indicate the complete topic, eg if you put `toto / 1`, all messages on the topic` test / toto / 1` will be automatically written on the command in question
index.md.d'indiqué le topic et le message, ex si: to indicate the topic and the message, ex if you put `foo / 2` with as message` plop` each click on the command will send the message `plop` on the topic` test / foo / 2`
index.md.Dans les commandes de type action vous p: In action type commands you can use tags
index.md.qui seront automatiquement remplacé en f: which will be automatically replaced according to the type of the command by their value during the execution of the command
index.md.Il est possible de piloter Jeedom à trav: It is possible to drive Jeedom through MQTT, here are the topics (the examples assume that the root topic is equal to `jeedom`, so you have to adapt if you have changed it
